properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; New Madrid, MO; Fulton, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 11:42AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
Mississippi River at New Madrid

.Heavy rainfall...along with anticipated rainfall over the next few
days will continue to cause rises on the Ohio and Mississippi River
basin. New Madrid Missouri is forecast to go above flood stage on
Wednesday afternoon with it expected to crested on Wednesday...
February 19th.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at New Madrid
* from Wednesday afternoon until further notice.
* At 11:00 AM Monday the stage was 31.8 feet.
* Flood Stage is 34.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Wednesday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 37.5 feet by Wednesday...the 19th of
Febraury.
* Impact...At 38.0 Feet...Heavy agricultural damage begins.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
